metadata.Title: CVE-2014-3542 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: mod/lti/service.php in Moodle through 2.3.11, 2.4.x before 2.4.11, 2.5.xbefore 2.5.7, 2.6.x before 2.6.4, and 2.7.x before 2.7.1 allows remoteattackers to read arbitrary files via an XML external entity declaration inconjunction with an entity reference, related to an XML External Entity(XXE) issue.

criterions.comment: moodle: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
